General.Name: Beluga Group PAO
General.Description: Public joint-stock company Beluga Group, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the production, wholesale, and retail of distilled alcohol and food products in Russia and internationally. It operates through three segments: Alcohol, Retail, and Food Production. The company provides vodkas primarily under the Beluga, Myagkov, Belenkaya, Russian Ice, Tsar, White owl, and Arkhangelskaya brands; brandy primarily under the Bastion, Zolotoy Rezerv, Staraya Gvardia, and Kamenniy Lev brands; and wine primarily under the Golubitskoe Estate and Tet de Cheval brands, as well as bitter under the Doctor August, Beluga Hunting, and Captain's brands. It also offers absinthe, balm, wine, whiskey, gin, calvados, cognac, liquor, tincture, rum, and tequila. The company was formerly known as Public Joint- Stock Company "Synergy' and changed its name to Beluga Group Public Joint-Stock Company in June 2017. Public joint-stock company Beluga Group was founded in 1998 and is based in Moscow, Russia.
